name: file-patch
description: command line diff / patch tool for https://github.com/google/diff-match-patch

scripts.examples-diff: node bin/file-diff examples/abc.txt examples/abc-mod.txt && node bin/file-diff examples/config.yml examples/config-mod.yml
scripts.examples-patch: node bin/file-patch examples/abc.txt.diff examples/abc.txt && node bin/file-patch examples/config.yml.diff examples/config.yml

author: Fred Lin <gasolin+npm@gmail.com>
